name: a forest (vividfax, mmarangoni)
description:
a forest is a walking simulator where words grow on trees and are carried by the wind. Stroll around your own personal landscape and plant words. The words you write may gain sentience and start to form their own ideas.

Made by Rianna Suen and Mariana Marangoni
Commissioned by the National Poetry Library and the Phoenix Cinema and Arts Centre for Playing Poetry
